data.title: Trevor Goddard Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Trevor Goddard on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Trevor Goddard including Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Blackâ¦
data.text:
King Of The Greenie Board

Harm adjusts to his new surroundings on the USS Patrick Henry, as the ships captain accidently attacks Russian peacekeepers.

Rules Of Engagement

After he murders three Russian officials, Buxton demands that Harm and Brumby be his lawyers, thereby preventing Harm from testifying against him.

Mr. Rabb Goes to Washington

Harm is assigned to a congressional committee investigating a TV reporter's story that accuses U.S. forces of using chemical weapons in the Gulf War.

The Return

Harm returns to JAG but his first case back involves a Navy JG and his political appointee father.

Front and Center

Harm is surprised when a routine meeting turns into an award ceremony for his second DFC. Harm and Bud try to track down a witness and rescuer who disappeared after an attempted rape.
